content.rendered:
Ever wanted to play with your food? Now you can! It’s time to play a little game of noughts and crosses! The only rule is that everyone must eat the game pieces once the game is over. Everyone wins at the snacking game!

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 box of Fry’s Chickpea and Roasted Butternut Balls
½ box of Fry’s Chicken-Style Strips
1 small carrot
Sweet chili sauce and hummus, to serve

Directions

Cook the Fry’s Chicken-Style Strips and Fry’s Chickpea and Roasted Butternut Balls according to the packaging instructions.

Slice the carrot into thin strips.

Arrange the Fry’s Chicken-Style Strips to form the “game board” on a large plate.

The carrot slices become your “cross” and the Fry’s Chickpea and Roasted Butternut Ballss form your “nought”.

Place the leftover carrot slices in another bowl for after the game.

Then let the game of Noughts and Crosses begin!

Once the game has ended, serve the carrots, Fry’s Chicken-Style Strips and Fry’s Chickpea and Roasted Butternut Balls with a sweet chili sauce and hummus.
